children.name: The administration of the lanes.ai domain, including all its subdomains, is committed to maintaining your privacy on the Internet.

The purposes for which we collect your personal data include: improving our service, communicating with visitors to this site, providing services associated with the website’s specialization, and other actions listed below.

We collect and process your personal data only with your willing consent. With your permission, we may collect and process the following data: first name and last name, e-mail address, company, and job title. The collection and processing of your personal information are carried out in accordance with the law of the USA.
During training sessions, we may use audio and video communication.

However, we do not collect any biometric data and do not use any tracking technologies during these sessions. The audio and video data are solely used for the purposes of the training session and are not stored or processed for any other purpose unless explicitly stated and consented to by the participants.

Before, during, and after the training sessions, participants may work on training-related materials such as quizzes, questionnaires, homework assignments, and other similar activities. We store the content generated and submitted by participants for data analytics purposes.

This data helps us improve training programs, understand participant engagement, and enhance overall training effectiveness. The content is used solely for these purposes and is not shared with third parties unless explicitly stated and consented to by the participants.

We use cookies for the correct display of the website’s content and for the convenience of browsing www.lanes.ai. Cookies are small files stored on your device that help the website remember information about you, such as the language you use and the pages you have already opened. This information will be useful on your next visit. Thanks to cookies, browsing the website becomes much more convenient. You can set up cookies reception and blocking in your browser. The inability to receive cookies may limit the functionality of the website.

Users who have provided www.lanes.ai with their personal data have the right to alter and remove it, as well as the right to recall their agreement to data processing. Your personal data will be stored for the duration necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including to comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. The retention period is determined based on the nature of the data and the purpose for which it was collected. Once the processing of your personal data is complete, the website’s administration will permanently delete it. To access your personal data, you can contact the administration at privacy@in.lanes.ai. We will pass your data to a third party only with your willing consent.
We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. These include secure servers, encrypted data transfer, and regular security audits.
While we strive to protect your personal data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

In the event of a data breach, we will promptly notify affected users via email and/or a prominent notice on our website. We will also take necessary steps to mitigate the breach and prevent future occurrences.

Records of your time of visit, browser settings, operating system, and other technical information are saved in the database when you visit www.lanes.ai. This data is necessary for the correct display of the website’s content. It is impossible to identify the person of the visitor using this data.

If you are a parent or a legal guardian of an underage child and you know that the child has provided us with their personal information without your consent, please contact us at privacy@in.lanes.ai. We will take steps to remove such information from our systems. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under the age of 13 without verifiable parental consent.
Processing of personal data by other services
Processing of personal data by other services

This website uses third-party online services such as Google Analytics, which perform data collection independent of us. All information collected by Google Analytics is anonymous and does not allow data to be attributed to particular users. You can learn about the user agreement of Google Analytics on their website
We deploy our application, process, store, and backup data using AWS (Amazon Web Services). You can study how AWS handles information by visiting their

We do not pass any personal data to other organizations or services not listed in this privacy policy. As an exception, collected data may be provided on a lawful request by state authorities authorized to request such information.

Your personal data may be transferred to, and processed in, countries other than the country in which you reside. These countries may have data protection laws that are different from those of your country. We ensure that your data is protected by appropriate safeguards when transferred internationally.

Our website www.lanes.ai may contain links to other websites not under our control. We are not responsible for the content of these websites. We recommend you familiarize yourself with the privacy policy of every website you visit if such a policy exists.
Materials from Events by Lanes AI LLC
Materials from Events by Lanes AI LLC

By registering for and/or attending our events, you consent to Lanes AI LLC recording audio and video, capturing screenshots, and taking photographs. You agree that Lanes AI LLC reserves the right to use these materials for marketing and business purposes, including sharing on social media platforms, the official website, and other digital resources. These materials may also be utilized in emails and personal messages for promotional and informational purposes. Your participation in Lanes AI LLC events constitutes acknowledgment and acceptance of this clause. If you do not wish to grant such permissions, please refrain from registering or attending Lanes events.

From time to time, our website www.lanes.ai may update our privacy policy. We will inform you of any changes to the privacy policy placed on this webpage. We monitor any changes in legislation related to personal data in the USA. If you have entered any of your personal data on our website, we will inform you about changes in our privacy policy. If your personal data, specifically your contact information, was entered incorrectly, we will not be able to contact you.

You can opt out of receiving our newsletter or marketing communications by following the unsubscribe link provided in the emails. To opt-out of data collection by third-party services, please refer to the instructions provided in their privacy policies.

By using our website, you consent to the collection and use of your personal data as described in this privacy policy. If we make significant changes to this policy, we will notify you and seek your consent where required.

You can contact the administration of www.lanes.ai regarding any questions related to this privacy policy at privacy@in.lanes.ai, or by filling out a contact form specified in a corresponding section of this website. If you do not agree with this privacy policy, you cannot use the services of www.lanes.ai. In this case, you should avoid visiting our website.
